name: GT Drift: Max Race Car
description:
GT Drift: Max Race Car is the most realistic 3D drift racing simulation game with 9 different levels and 9 different cars.This drifting game is very unique when you compared it with other Drift Racing games because it has Real drifting tracks to run your Racing cars and you can shuffle your cars too.
Features
- different Powerful Cars having specific and realistic Setup installed
-Coins to get if u win a Race to unlock other drifting cars
-Different maps with real Environments
-IN App Purchases to unlock levels and vehicles
-Achieve Target to Unlock Next Level
-Realistic Drift Controls
